name: treatment of waste plastic plaster, collection for final disposal | waste plastic plaster | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/27825/documentation

The process represents the collection of 'waste plastic plaster' for final disposal. The waste contains 1kg plastic plaster, while its density is 1300 kg/m3.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity includes particulate matter emissions from dismantling and handling, and final disposal of waste material.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters are not specific to this geography.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty and Production Volume (PV) has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: waste-specific calculation based on literature data
